cfca.x509.certificate
Class X509Cert

java.lang.Object
  cfca.x509.certificate.X509Cert

public class X509Cert
extends java.lang.Object

X509Cert class is an encapsulation of the X509 certificate. It is used for constructing and parsing the X509 certificate.

X509Cert based on ASN1 can be instantiated by three ways, DER coding format byte data of the certificate, DER coding format input stream of the certificate and the X509 certificate structure.After a X509Cert object instantiated successfully, it can be used for parsing X509 certificate.

getIssuer

public java.lang.String getIssuer(X500NameStyle style)
Get the X509 certificate issuer.

Parameters:
style - Control the issuer show format,at present just support these values: CFCAStyle.INSTANCE (eg. CN=041@820000001-3@10014540@00000009, OU=Enterprises, OU=CGB, O=CFCA TEST CA, C=CN) RFC4519Style.INSTANCE (eg. CN=041@820000001-3@10014540@00000009,OU=Enterprises,OU=CGB,O=CFCA TEST CA,C=CN) BCStyle.INSTANCE (eg. C=CN,O=CFCA TEST CA,OU=CGB,OU=Enterprises,CN=041@820000001-3@10014540@00000009)
Returns:
Issuer Name
